title: News reports from France. [No. 71/61] = Chroniques de France
brief_description: Cinemagazine: 1. The Cathedral of Chartres - 2,500,000 visitors still come each year to hail Our Lady of Chartres. 2. The circus - A glimpse of France’s circuses (no commentary). 3. Archaelogical discoveries: Susa, Persia - At the close of the 6th century BC the Persian Empire extended from the Mediterranean all the way to the Indus river. Its administrative capital was the city of Susa. Today, a French crew of archaeologists is discovering its buried treasures.
